org.programus.nxj.rockboy.core.mc
Class McVector

java.lang.Object
  org.programus.nxj.rockboy.core.mc.McObject
      org.programus.nxj.rockboy.core.mc.McVector

public class McVector
extends McObject

Multi-Coordinate vector.

This is a real vector, not a list-like class in java.util package. A vector has a absolute value and an angle (as McAngle object). One vector can be orthogonal decomposed into two components in LCD coordinate or natural coordinate.

Author:
Programus
See Also:
McAngle

getMcAngleRef

public McAngle getMcAngleRef()
Return the reference of the McAngle. If you changed the value of the reference you get, it will affect the vector.

Returns:
the reference of the McAngle.

getMcAngleClone

public McAngle getMcAngleClone()
Return a clone of the McAngle. Changes on the return value won't affect this vector.

Returns:
a clone of the McAngle.
